channel.title: Portfolio website for Danya
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio website for Danya

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello everyone! I am Danya from China. I graduated from Fudan University in Shanghai, China. Currently, I am an MFA student at London Business School. This is my portfolio website and I will upload my recent projects and share my life here! Stay tuned!

item.title: Lifestyle
item.description: My blogs about technology and lifestyle.

item.title: My travel journey of America
item.description: In January 2020, I traveled to Los Angeles. I watched a game of the Lakers, which is my favorite NBA team. I am so excited that they just won the champion this week!

item.title: My travel journey of Greece
item.description: I spent my summer of 2018 in Greece. I love Athens, Santorini, and Thira. Hope one day I can go there another time!

item.title: Projects
item.description: My blogs about technology and lifestyle.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
